## Docs-as-Code checklist

- [ ] Documentation updated (docs/ or Documents/Documentation/src)
- [ ] Docs generated (`./scripts/generate_docs.sh`) and committed
- [ ] Validation passed (`./scripts/validate_all.sh`)
- [ ] Reviewer checked doc accuracy

## Testing

- [ ] Manual test on Raspberry Pi
- [ ] Automated validation (`./scripts/validate_all.sh`)
